item.title: Why Charlie Kirk’s funeral is a seminal moment in the modern conservative movement
item.description: Kirk’s killing has galvanized and united the conservative movement in a singular way.

item.title: Trump and China’s Xi set to discuss trade tensions, TikTok deal

item.title: Lawmakers will introduce bill to kill tariffs on coffee
item.description: The bipartisan legislation would give coffee a carve-out from President Donald Trump’s tariffs.
